comment.text: This translation key is used to display the label for a file selection action, appearing as "Select File" in various UI elements such as buttons or dialogs. It is part of a set of translations related to file management and appears on the FilesSelector component.

usage.context:
<Text className="or-text">{t("Common:Or")}</Text>
 
 <FileInput
 idButton="select-file"
 accept={[".xml"]}
 buttonLabel={t("Common:SelectFile")}
 className="xml-upload-file"
 isDisabled={!enableSso || isLoadingXml}
 onInput={uploadXml}
 size="middle"
 tabIndex={3}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Selectare fișier' isn't the most natural or idiomatic translation of 'Select file'. While technically correct, it sounds somewhat formal and awkward. A more common and natural translation would be 'Alege fișier' or 'Selectează fișier'.

The translation 'Изабери датотеку' while technically understandable, is not the most natural or idiomatic translation of 'Select file' in Serbian (Cyrillic). A more common and preferred translation would be 'Избери датотеку'.
The translation 'Dosya Seç' is a literal word-for-word translation but sounds awkward and isn't the most natural way to say 'Select file' in Turkish. It lacks a grammatical connector.
